body_html:
@pjh5, I don't have my work machine right now. I will post it in a few hours. In the meantime, what do you recommend I should run?

I have installed NVIDIA packages, both on machine and though conda. conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7 is on the webpage of caffe2. So what do you suggest?

body:
@pjh5, I don't have my work machine right now. I will post it in a few hours. In the meantime, what do you recommend I should run? 

I have installed NVIDIA packages, both on machine and though conda. `conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7` is on the webpage of caffe2. So what do you suggest?
